statements: SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 200 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY rating ASC;
SELECT MAX(rating) AS highest_rating FROM feedback;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_feedback >= 2;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS feedback_count FROM feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING feedback_count > 1 ORDER BY feedback_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_performance ORDER BY performance_metric DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, performance_metric FROM chatbot_performance WHERE performance_metric > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT performance_id, chatbot_version FROM chatbot_performance WHERE performance_metric >= 0.8;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%improve%';
SELECT feedback_id, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 456 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM customers_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_date FROM customers_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_performance WHERE total_interactions > 1000;
SELECT chatbot_id, success_rate FROM chatbot_performance WHERE performance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM customers_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%improve%' ORDER BY rating ASC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM customers_feedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT c.chatbot_id, c.total_interactions, p.success_rate FROM chatbot_performance c JOIN customers_feedback f ON c.chatbot_id = f.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT chatbot_id, log_timestamp FROM ChatbotLogs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT chatbot_id, accuracy FROM ChatbotPerformance WHERE accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT feedback_id, sentiment, feedback_score FROM FeedbackAnalysis WHERE feedback_score < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT chatbot_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM ChatbotLogs GROUP BY chatbot_id ORDER BY total_logs DESC;
SELECT chatbot_id, AVG(accuracy) AS avg_accuracy FROM ChatbotPerformance GROUP BY chatbot_id HAVING avg_accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT feedback_id, sentiment, feedback_score FROM FeedbackAnalysis WHERE feedback_score > 0.5 ORDER BY feedback_id;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_feedback WHERE satisfaction_score > 3;
SELECT feedback_text FROM chatbot_feedback WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT first_name, email_address FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM interactions_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(accuracy_score) AS avg_accuracy FROM chatbot_performance;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, satisfaction_score FROM chatbot_feedback WHERE satisfaction_score > 3 ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM interactions_log WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_text, implementation_timestamp FROM chatbot_improvements ORDER BY implementation_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
